description: Write a method called `twoSum(int[] nums, int target)` that returns indices of two numbers that add up to target.
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
notes: Return indices, not the values themselves
Each input has exactly one solution
Cannot use the same element twice
hints: Use HashMap to store seen numbers
For each number, check if target-number exists
Time complexity can be O(n) with HashMap
